---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an improvement or new skill
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Type

- [ ] Improvement to existing skill
- [ ] New research skill
- [ ] New quality/analysis skill
- [ ] New creation/enhancement skill
- [ ] New agent configuration skill
- [ ] New reference material (strategies/patterns/criteria)
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Other

## Description

Clear description of what you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves

What problem does this address? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

How would this work? What would the workflow look like?

## Example Usage

Show an example of how this would be used:

```
User: [example input]
Skill: [example workflow phase]
Output: [example report/output]
```

## Alternative Approaches

Are there other ways to solve this?

## Additional Context

Any other relevant information, examples, or references.
